pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# vs-scale### VapourSynth (de)scale functions
Wrappers for scaling and descaling functions.For support you can check out the [JET Discord server](https://discord.gg/XTpc6Fa9eB).

## How to installInstall `vsscale` with the following command:```shpip install vsscale```Or if you want the latest git version, install it with this command:```shpip install git+https://github.com/Jaded-Encoding-Thaumaturgy/vs-scale.git```
